metadata.title: CVE-2021-38498 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: During process shutdown, a document could have caused a use-after-free of alanguages service object, leading to memory corruption and a potentiallyexploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 93, Thunderbird <91.2, and Firefox ESR < 91.2.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
